indicator_name: Émissions de CO2 par unité de valeur ajoutée
SDG_GOAL: Goal 9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
SDG_TARGET: Target 9.4: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 9.4.1: CO2 emission per unit of value added
STAT_CONC_DEF: Carbon dioxide (here after, CO2) emissions per unit of value added is an indicator computed as ratio between CO2 emissions from fuel combustion and the value added of associated economic activities. The indicator can be computed for the whole economy (total CO2 emissions/GDP) or for specific sectors, notably the manufacturing sector (CO2 emissions from manufacturing industries per manufacturing value added (MVA).
